title: Argyll and Bute painting in national exhibition (Argyll and Bute Council)
text: ( Source : Argyll and Bute Council ) A painting owned by Argyll and Bute Council is to go on display at the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art as part of an exhibition that will celebrate the work of Scottish female artists. HÃ´pital
